text: Yoruba is an ethnic group of people living in Africa. They live on the west coast of Africa, mostly they are one of the major tribes in Nigeria and Ghana. ==Notable people== *Yemi Osinbajo, Vice President of Nigeria *T. B. Joshua, religious figure *Olajide Fashikun, journalist == References == Category:Ethnic groups in Ghana Category:Ethnic groups in Nigeria
title: Yoruba people
